oai_dc:dc.dc:title: McConnell Field
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: McConnell Field was the first true municipal airport for the city of Nashville. It was located along Murphy Road, Richland Creek, the NC & St.L railroad and Colorado Avenue.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Airports;Airplanes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Metropolitan Government
